# agroforlight

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of agroforlight is to provide functions that enable processing results from the 3-D tool for agroforestry light simulations available at [<https://agroforestry.ugent.be>].

[![Screenshot from https://agroforestry.ugent.be](man/figures/printscreen.png)](https://agroforestry.ugent.be)

## Installation

You can install the development version of agroforlight from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tdeswaef/agroforlight")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(agroforlight)
## basic example code
```
